column1: There once lived in a town of Persia two brothers
column3: and the other Ali Baba. Their father divided a small inheritance equally between them. Cassim married a very rich wife
column4: and became a wealthy merchant. Ali Baba married a woman as poor as himself
column6: and bringing it upon three asses into the town to sell.One day
column7: when Ali Baba was in the forest
column8: and had just cut wood enough to load his asses
column9: he saw at a distance a great cloud of dust
column10: which seemed to approach him. He observed it with attention
column11: and distinguished soon after a body of horsemen
column12: whom he suspected might be robbers. He determined to leave his asses to save himself. He climbed up a large tree
column14: whose branches were thick enough to conceal him
column15: and yet enabled him to see all that passed without being discovered.
